resource_dependency.cartoonStyleCSS: CSS file implementing a cartoon-style theme with seashell backgrounds for containers and crimson-colored components.
resource_dependency.responsiveDesignFramework: Use of CSS media queries or responsive framework like TailwindCSS or Bootstrap to ensure cross-device compatibility.

function: Provide a visually appealing frontend application designed specifically for children using a cartoon aesthetic.
static_description: The website uses a playful color scheme with seashell background tones for container areas and crimson accents for interactive elements. All buttons, panels, and UI components follow a cartoonish design style. The layout adjusts responsively based on screen size.

resource_dependency.wasteItemImages: Set of image assets representing various recyclable items (e.g., plastic bottle, paper, glass jar) in a cartoon style.
resource_dependency.recyclingContainerAssets: Image assets for recycling bins labeled clearly for different waste categories (plastic, paper, metal/glass, organic).
resource_dependency.dragDropLibrary: Frontend library such as HTML5 Drag and Drop API or React DnD for enabling drag-and-drop functionality.

function: Allow children to interactively sort virtual waste items into appropriate recycling containers.
static_description: Multiple cartoon-style waste item icons are displayed on the left side of the screen. On the right side, there are four distinct recycling bin containers labeled for plastic, paper, metal/glass, and organic waste. Each container features a seashell background texture.

interaction_and_states.description: Users can drag waste item images from the display area onto one of the recycling bins. Upon dropping, the item disappears from view and triggers validation logic via API call.

resource_dependency.feedbackPopupAssets: Icons and messages indicating correct ('Great job!') or incorrect ('Try again!') feedback responses.
resource_dependency.soundEffects: Audio clips for success/failure sounds triggered during sorting actions.

function: Provide immediate feedback after each sorting decision made by the child.
static_description: A notification popup appears centered above the game board showing either a positive emoji with encouraging text or a gentle correction message depending on correctness.

interaction_and_states.description: After an item is dropped into a bin, a short animation plays followed by a pop-up message and audio cue indicating if the choice was correct or not.

resource_dependency.rewardIcons: Visual assets for badges, stars, coins, etc., awarded upon successful sorting attempts.

function: Motivate continued engagement through rewarding correct recycling decisions.
static_description: At the top-right corner of the screen, a counter displays earned rewards such as stars or coins. Visual badges appear when milestones are reached.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon correct placement, the reward counter increases visibly and a celebratory animation plays briefly near the counter area.

resource_dependency.playerAvatarPlaceholder: Default avatar image used when no custom avatar is provided by user.

function: Display a ranked list of top players to foster healthy competition among users.
static_description: Located at the bottom of the main page, a scrollable leaderboard panel shows player avatars, usernames, and total points scored, ordered from highest to lowest.

interaction_and_states.description: User scrolls vertically within the leaderboard container to see more entries beyond the initially visible ones.

resource_dependency.gameDataSchema: Fields: player_id (UUID), session_id (UUID), timestamp (datetime), item_sorted (string), target_bin (string), result_correct (boolean), score_delta (integer)

function: Expose endpoints for managing game events, scoring updates, and retrieving leaderboard data.
static_description: RESTful API routes available under /api/game providing POST for recording sort results, GET for fetching current leaderboard standings, and PATCH for updating scores.

resource_dependency.postgresConnectionConfig: Environment variables: DB_HOST=localhost, DB_PORT=5432, DB_USERNAME=myappuser, DB_PASSWORD=myapppassword, DB_NAME=myapp
resource_dependency.databaseInitScript: SQL script initializing tables: game_sessions, player_scores, leaderboard_entries, player_profiles

function: Establish persistent storage layer for all game-related data using PostgreSQL.
static_description: Database schema includes tables for tracking individual game sessions, cumulative player scores, and global leaderboard rankings. Connection established using predefined environment variables.

resource_dependency.playerProfileSchema: Fields: player_id (UUID), username (string), avatar_url (optional string), created_at (datetime)

function: Enable identification and progress tracking for returning players without requiring complex login flows.
static_description: A simple registration form allows entry of a unique username which gets stored along with a generated UUID. Optional profile picture upload supported but not mandatory.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting the register form generates a new player record and returns a token or identifier used for future requests.

resource_dependency.animationLibrary: JavaScript/CSS libraries such as GSAP or Framer Motion for smooth animations.
resource_dependency.interactiveSoundLibrary: Web Audio API or Howler.js implementation for playing engaging sound effects.

function: Enhance interactivity and appeal through animated transitions and audio cues tailored for children.
static_description: All major UI changes (item drop, feedback reveal, reward increment) include subtle bounce/slide animations. Matching sound effects accompany these events.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon release of dragged item, a small bounce effect occurs before disappearing. Correct answers trigger cheerful jingle while mistakes play soft chime.

resource_dependency.educationalContentAssets: Pop-up modals or tooltips containing illustrated guides explaining what belongs in each recycling category.
resource_dependency.infoModalTrigger: Small info icon next to each recycling bin label that opens educational content overlay.

function: Integrate learning opportunities directly into gameplay mechanics.
static_description: Each recycling bin has an adjacent 'i' icon. Clicking reveals a modal window with colorful illustrations and brief descriptions about acceptable materials for that category.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking the info icon overlays a semi-transparent modal explaining the contents of that particular recycling bin with supporting graphics.

resource_dependency.graphVisualizationComponent: Charting tool like Chart.js to render progress graphs over time.

function: Help children visualize their improvement and stay motivated through measurable achievements.
static_description: Accessible via menu tab, this section presents line charts plotting accuracy rate and total score growth over multiple sessions.

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting 'My Progress' navigates to dashboard where historical performance metrics are visualized using simple chart elements.

resource_dependency.responsiveDesignFramework: Implementation using mobile-first CSS techniques ensuring compatibility across smartphones, tablets, and desktop browsers.

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience regardless of device type or orientation.
static_description: Layout dynamically adapts to screen dimensions using flexible grids and scalable font sizes. Touch targets adjust appropriately for smaller screens.

resource_dependency.packageJsonScripts: "install:all": "concurrently \"cd client && npm install\" \"cd server && npm install\""

function: Streamline development setup by allowing installation of both frontend and backend dependencies simultaneously.
static_description: Running 'npm run install:all' executes two parallel processes installing packages for client-side and server-side codebases respectively.

resource_dependency.devServerScripts: "dev": "concurrently \"cd client && npm run dev\" \"cd server && npm run dev\" --names \"CLIENT,SERV\" --prefix name"

function: Facilitate simultaneous local development of frontend and backend services.
static_description: Executing 'npm run dev' launches both the frontend development server and backend Node.js instance concurrently, displaying logs prefixed by 'CLIENT' and 'SERV'.

resource_dependency.persistenceSchemas: Defined earlier: game_sessions, player_scores, leaderboard_entries, player_profiles with appropriate indexes and constraints.

function: Maintain long-term records of gameplay activity, user achievements, and statistical insights.
static_description: PostgreSQL tables store every sorting event, maintain cumulative point totals per player, update global rankings automatically, and preserve basic profile information securely.
